doc.field: Records of the Office of the Chancellor/Executive Vice President (Sidney Borowitz)
Records of the Office of the Chancellor/Executive Vice President (Sidney Borowitz)

The contents of this modest series (.83 linear feet) provide some perspective on the University's plant and associated services and cost concerns. Selected information about academic building maintenance and renovation, Bobst Library, bookstores, computer services, energy needs, housing, planning a student recreation facility, and security appears. Of particular interest is a miscellany of materials concerned with the physical property at the University Heights campus and its disposition, Box 27, folder 12.
Records of the Office of the Chancellor/Executive Vice President (Sidney Borowitz)
